sentences.en: Most in chronic period, simple type, catatonic type and male patients.
sentences.cn: 12%,多见于慢性期 、 单纯型 、 紧张型及男性.

sentences.en: With an almost catatonic concentration, almost without blinking or licking my lips, I read the entire book from first to last word without stopping.
sentences.cn: 近乎精神紧张，我没眨眼或舔嘴唇，停也没停就把整本书看完了。

trans.tran_cn: （患）紧张症的， （患）强直性昏厥的
